metadata.title: ERIJUNOR Women Comfortable Middle Heel Peep Toe Bows Rhinestones Satin Wedding Evening Party Shoes
features: Style: Peep toe mid heel sandals with cute bow and ankle straps, matching all kinds of skirt
Feature: lovely bow knot with sparkly crystals, simple and elegant, suitable for dance and party
Occasion: Fit for wedding, prom, evening party, cocktail, club, homecoming, graduation and any other special formal occasions
Size: For US 4/5/6/7/8/9/10/11,please check the sizing info before purchasing
description: Exact heel height 3 inches good for walking and dancing.Non-slip rubber sole to ensure safety.Lightly padded for long time wear.
Each pair with one pair high heel pads and shoe box makes it a perfect gift good for wedding gift,daily use,shoe storage etc.

ERIJUNOR is a shoe brand and focus on designing and manufacturing women's wedding,bridal,bridesmaid,dancing,prom,evening shoes and so on.ERIJUNOR got a high level of designing and manufacturing shoes with distinctive design and meticulous craft,each pair of pumps you wear adhere to designer ingenuity.ERIJUNOR shoes are sold worldwide,so all ERIJUNOR shoes model are made in standard EU size.If you are unsure of which size you should choose,you can also confirm it in our size chart or contact us.Thank you!

1.Clean the shoes thoroughly with neutral detergent and a soft bristled brush to remove extra dirt.2.Please take care of the shoes by gently carding along with the nature grain of the fabric.3.Use shoe boxes to keep them if you do not wear.4.Be sure to place them away from moist environment and avoid direct sun exposure.
